choices: All kids in the world grow
1.content:
First of all, how does the growth begin:

1) All children in the world begin growing, a few at a time or all at once

2) A scientist develops a growth ray

3) Children suddenly develop the power to grow at will

4) One kid finds a way to grow, at least at first

5) Something else
1.title: Genesis of Growth

choices: Growing looks fun! You sneak out
You feel yourself starting to grow
11.content:
You were six year old Jake, a typical boy with blond hair and green eyes. You were laying on the couch one day reading a book. You had heard over the news lately of a new virus that was effecting kids of a younger age but your mommy always pushed you out of the room when those stories came on.

You were almost done with your book when there came a hammering knock on your door. Your mommy opened it and you saw Mrs. Drant standing on your porch, a scared look on her face.

"Liz, what's wrong?" You mommy asked.

"It's Jake, he was exposed to the virus!" Mrs. Drant shouted. It was then you started to hear loud crashes and other noises from across the street. Looking out the window you saw your best friend Jake growing out of his house. His head was already pushing through the roof, and he had a happy grin on his face. As the roof crumbled to the ground Jake's peepee pushed its way through the front wall.

Then further down the block you spotted your girlfriend Sally also growing out of her house, her parents and sisters desperately escaping through the back door as the blond stepped through the front wall. At the opposite end of the street a five year old girl was sobbing as she grew out of her cloths.

"Jake, where are you?!" Your mommy called into the living room.
11.title: All kids in the world grow

14.content:
Melissa is a six year old girl who lives in a small town in Nevada with her father, big brother Ryan and little sister Sierra. She loves playing outdoors with her siblings and pretending to be a movie monster. Her brother mostly hangs out with his own friends and ignores her. Her little sister on the other hand adores her big sister and the two are almost inseparable.


Derek is nine years old and lives with his father and two brothers. His father is in the military and the family moves around a lot, and as a result he never made any real friends except for his brothers. They love their father but also resent the fact they have to move around all the time and wish they were big and strong enough to make things go how they want.

Who shall the first grower on Earth be?
14.title: The First Grower

15.content: What about aliens using Earth as a testing site for their experimental growth technology?
15.title: Alien Experiment Growth?

152.title: Seen this movie. Something else

1523.title: Futa Growth

That day was unremarkable. It was evening, everyone was having dinner. The TV is playing in the background, and soft lights illuminate the room. Parents were constantly concerned about their daughter's weak appetite, so when she started eating so much, it did not surprise them at all. But then they started to worry. 15233.content: How about Rampage Growth? Maybe through magic, virus, or mysterious radiation but it seems to only affect those under 13. They grow with every bit of destruction.
15233.title: Something else

info.brief_description: Kids begin growing in various ways and having their way with the world
info.description:
The return of one of my favorite interactives. Original was taken down for reasons I never learned, so I wanted to restart it here. All the thanks to the original author.

Rules:

1) Only those under 13 can grow. No giant/ess teenagers

2) Clothing does not grow with the kids. It just doesn't make sense it would

3) Please make each chapter at least 5 sentences. Any chapters with less will be given a chance to lengthen them, or I will alter them if not.

4) Have Fun!
